fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Culture, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Taxation
eu_initiatives: Taxation and topics related to charities.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
The Charity Tax Group (CTG) has over 400 members of all sizes representing all types of charitable activity. CTG was set up in 1982 to make representations to Government on charity taxation and it has since become the leading voice for the sector on this issue.  
 
Through CTG, you can: 
 
    * be part of the sector's leading authority on tax and charities 
    * help to reduce the sector's irrecoverable VAT bill - now £1 billion a year 
    * improve tax concessions on giving 
    * identify new ways of helping the sector
